archimate:ApplicationService.name: [Data Backbone] Tape Staging Service (Application Service)
archimate:ApplicationService.documentation:
Tape Staging Service orchestrates tape staging requests with the underlying mass store tape staging service.
Tape Staging Service causes files files resident on tape to appear in the mass storage disk cache. ONce the files ahve appeared in the mass storage disk caches, the files are transported to the appropriate LSST working storage. The service also orchestrates a number of tape store requests in order to not overwhelm cache withing the tape staging service.
